mapper.select:
select
from sys_export

select
from sys_export
${OperatorVoicesListBySql}

SELECT IFNULL(t1.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' FROM cl_user t0 LEFT JOIN cl_channel t1 on t0.channel_id = t1.id WHERE regist_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and regist_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t0.channel_id order by t0.channel_id

select IFNULL(t1.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' from cl_user_apply_log t0 LEFT JOIN cl_channel t1 on t0.channel_id = t1.id WHERE t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t0.channel_id order by t0.channel_id

select IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' from cl_user_auth t0,cl_user t1 LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 ON t1.channel_id = t2.id where t0.user_id = t1.id and t0.id_state = 30 and t0.contact_state = 30 and t0.contact_state = 30 and t0.phone_state = 30 and t1.regist_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t1.regist_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id order by t1.channel_id

select IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' from cl_borrow t0 LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 on t0.user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id where t0.user_id not in ( SELECT DISTINCT(t0.user_id) from cl_borrow_repay t0 where t0.state = 10 ) and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id order by t1.channel_id

SELECT IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' FROM cl_borrow_progress t LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 ON t.user_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id WHERE t.user_id not in ( select DISTINCT(user_id) from ( select count(id) cc,user_id from cl_borrow t where state in (20,26,30,40,41,50) group by user_id ) tt where tt.cc>1 ) and t.state=30 and t.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id ORDER BY t1.channel_id

select IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' from cl_borrow t0 LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 on t0.user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id where t0.user_id in ( SELECT DISTINCT(t0.user_id) from cl_borrow_repay t0 where t0.state = 10 ) and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id order by t1.channel_id

select IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' from cl_borrow_progress t0 LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 ON t0.user_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id where t0.state = 30 and t0.user_id in ( select t0.user_id from cl_borrow_progress t0 where t0.state = 40 and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ) and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id ORDER BY t1.channel_id

SELECT IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' FROM cl_borrow_progress t LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 ON t.user_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id WHERE t.user_id in ( select DISTINCT(user_id) from ( select count(id) cc,user_id from cl_borrow t where state in (20,26,30,40,41,50) group by user_id ) tt where tt.cc>1
) and t.state=30 AND t.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id ORDER BY t1.channel_id

select IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' FROM cl_day_active_statistics_1 t LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 ON t.user_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id WHERE t.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id ORDER BY t1.channel_id

select IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' from cl_borrow t0 LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 on t0.user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id where t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id order by t1.channel_id

SELECT IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code',count(DISTINCT(t.user_id)) 'num' FROM cl_borrow_progress t LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 ON t.user_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id WHERE t.state in (20,22,26) AND t.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id ORDER BY t1.channel_id

SELECT IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', count(1) 'num' FROM cl_borrow_progress t LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 ON t.user_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id WHERE t.state=30 AND t.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id ORDER BY t1.channel_id

select IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code',sum(t.real_amount) 'num' from cl_borrow t LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 ON t.user_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id where t.id in ( SELECT t.borrow_id FROM cl_borrow_progress t WHERE t.state=30 AND t.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY t.user_id ) GROUP BY t1.channel_id
select count(1) from cl_borrow t0 where t0.real_amount = 500 and t0.time_limit = 7 and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select count(1) from cl_borrow_progress t0, cl_borrow t1 where t0.borrow_id = t1.id and t0.state=30 and t1.real_amount = 500 and t1.time_limit = 7 and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
select count(1) from cl_borrow t0 where t0.real_amount = 500 and t0.time_limit = 14 and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select count(1) from cl_borrow_progress t0, cl_borrow t1 where t0.borrow_id = t1.id and t0.state=30 and t1.real_amount = 500 and t1.time_limit = 14 and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
select count(1) from cl_borrow t0 where t0.real_amount = 1000 and t0.time_limit = 7 and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select count(1) from cl_borrow_progress t0, cl_borrow t1 where t0.borrow_id = t1.id and t0.state=30 and t1.real_amount = 1000 and t1.time_limit = 7 and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
select count(1) from cl_borrow t0 where t0.real_amount = 1000 and t0.time_limit = 14 and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select count(1) from cl_borrow_progress t0, cl_borrow t1 where t0.borrow_id = t1.id and t0.state=30 and t1.real_amount = 1000 and t1.time_limit = 14 and t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
SELECT count(1) from cl_borrow_progress t where t.state=30 AND t.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

SELECT count(1) from cl_borrow_progress t WHERE t.user_id not in ( select DISTINCT(user_id) from ( select count(id) cc,user_id from cl_borrow t where state in (20,26,30,40,41,50) group by user_id ) tt where tt.cc>1 ) and t.state=30 AND t.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

SELECT count(1) from cl_borrow_progress t WHERE t.user_id in ( select DISTINCT(user_id) from ( select count(id) cc,user_id from cl_borrow t where state in (20,26,30,40,41,50) group by user_id ) tt where tt.cc>#{xudaiStart} and tt.cc<=#{xudaiEnd}
) and t.state=30 AND t.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

select IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', sum(t.real_amount) 'num' from cl_borrow t LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 ON t.user_id=t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 on t1.channel_id = t2.id where t.id in ( SELECT t.borrow_id FROM cl_borrow_progress t WHERE t.state=30 AND t.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY t.user_id ) AND t.user_id in ( select DISTINCT(user_id) from ( select count(id) cc,user_id from cl_borrow t where state in (20,26,30,40,41,50) group by user_id ) tt where tt.cc>1 ) GROUP BY t1.channel_id

SELECT IFNULL(t2.code,'app') 'code', sum(t0.amount + t0.penalty_amout) 'money', count(t0.id) 'num' FROM cl_borrow_repay_log t0 LEFT JOIN cl_user t1 ON t0.user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN cl_channel t2 ON t1.channel_id = t2.id WHERE t0.create_time >= #{todayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t0.create_time < #{tomorrowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t1.channel_id
